content: Read package.json, then list all sessions

The contents of `package.json` are as follows:

```json
{
  "name": "vargos",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "description": "Vargos - Agentic MCP server with OpenClaw-style tools",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "tsx src/index.ts",
    "cli": "tsx src/cli.ts",
    "build": "tsc",
    "test": "vitest",
    "test:run": "vitest run",
    "lint": "eslint src/**/*.ts && tsc --noEmit",
    "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@langchain/anthropic": "^1.3.15",
    "@langchain/core": "^1.1.19",
    "@langchain/google-genai": "^2.1.15",
    "@langchain/openai": "^1.2.5",
    "@mariozechner/pi-agent-core": "^0.50.7",
    "@mariozechner/pi-ai": "^0.50.7",
    "@mariozechner/pi-coding-agent": "^0.50.7",
    "@modelcontextprotocol/sdk": "^1.26.0",
    "@qdrant/js-client-rest": "^1.16.2",
    "chalk": "^5.3.0",
    "commander": "^12.0.0",
    "cron": "^4.4.0",
    "dotenv": "^17.2.4",
    "playwright": "^1.58.1",
    "postgres": "^3.4.8",
    "sqlite": "^5.1.1",
    "sqlite3": "^5.1.7",
    "tinyglobby": "^0.2.15",
    "zod": "^3.23.8",
    "zod-to-json-schema": "^3.25.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@eslint/js": "^9.39.2",
    "@types/cron": "^2.4.3",
    "@types/node": "^25.2.1",
    "@types/sqlite3": "^5.1.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.54.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.54.0",
    "eslint": "^9.39.2",
    "tsx": "^4.21.0",
    "typescript": "^5.9.3",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.54.0",
    "vitest": "^4.0.18"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=20"
  }
}
```
